content.body: Alice: surprised https://alice.pages.igalia.com/blog/how-shadow-dom-and-accessibility-are-in-conflict/ doesn't mention the idea of allowing ElementInternals's element-reflecting attributes to point anywhere as long as the shadow-including root is the same

content.body: Jake Archibald: FWIW, I like some of the suggestions along the lines of "EventTarget's addEventListener() method"; you could have "Response's json() method" and "Response's static json() method"
content.formatted_body: Jake Archibald: FWIW, I like some of the suggestions along the lines of "EventTarget's addEventListener() method"; you could have "Response's json() method" and "Response's static json() method"

content.body: Something along those lines is what I often do whenever we add a new method to a spec
annevk: when I see both of those examples, I know which is the static method and which is the instance method, but if you just showed me "Response's json() method" I wouldn't be sure
content.formatted_body: annevk: when I see both of those examples, I know which is the static method and which is the instance method, but if you just showed me "Response's json() method" I wouldn't be sure

content.body: Jake Archibald: as a first time visitor you might have to look at an example, but as a repeat visitor it'd be clear, no?
content.formatted_body: Jake Archibald: as a first time visitor you might have to look at an example, but as a repeat visitor it'd be clear, no?

content.body: annevk: yeah, but if you have to learn a pattern anyway, "response.json()" is clearer and matches what you'd search for. "instance method" vs "static method" would make it clearer though
content.formatted_body: annevk: yeah, but if you have to learn a pattern anyway, "response.json()" is clearer and matches what you'd search for. "instance method" vs "static method" would make it clearer though

content.body: maybe search would be fine due to the rest of the content
I definitely search for things like `mdn formdata.get`
content.formatted_body: I definitely search for things like mdn formdata.get

content.body: (I'd be fine with your suggestion though. Anything that gets us away from `FormData.get` is an improvement
